transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes, Raman ji boliye.
Customer: Haan ji sir ji, ha ji available hai? Aap aawaz aa raha hai kya?
Executive: Haan aa rahi hai sir aa rahi hai aapki aawaz, mera aawaz aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Haan aapka ekdam clear aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji aapka bhi aa raha hai sahi. Abhi aapko enable kar diya hai.
Customer: Kiya kiya.
Executive: Kya naam? Abhi mujhe ye bataiye dekhiye abhi abhi jo hai na abhi jo aapne chaar paanch jo category bheja hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan haan kiya kiya aapko aapko bheja tha whatsapp pe. Abhi jo aapne chaar paanch keyword bheja hai usse related inquiry abhi chahiye right?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Abhi apna jo product hai sir dekhiye seasonal wise product hai kuch kuch product jo hai na jab bhi aap se meri baat hoti hai na to kuch na kuch different different product hai.
Executive: Right, seasonal wise. To usko update karne mein inquiries ko generate karne mein na hota hai jiska inquiry aap regular basis pe consume karenge na uska inquiry aapko regular basis pe aata rahega.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Sir mein jaise aap category change kar denge products.
Customer: Kya bola? Aayega sir aayega.
Customer: Kab abhi do week ho gaye sir Diwali ke baad bhi.
Customer: Diwali itna season tha isliye chup baithe rahe socha jaane do chaliye. Abhi Diwali ho gayi.
Executive: Sir dekhiye. Abhi aapka jo aapne jo bhi lead aapne consume kara hai na.
Customer: Wo lead consumption bhi hum check kar rahe the transaction check kar rahe the lead consumption.
Executive: Kya naam? Dekhiye maine jo buylead liye hai wo.
Customer: Wo sab product se related hi liye hai jo aaye hai.
Executive: Wahi to bola sir aaj bhi aapne 40.
Customer: Aapne aaj bhi 40 consume kara hai na.
Customer: Haan haan abhi jo nahi aaye na select nahi kiye product.
Customer: Wo aap dekhiye ki aapne category mein kaun sa product hai jo usme nahi aaya wo uska buylead nahi aa raha hai. Ye aap usme aap samajh jayenge. Samjho ki aap porting ka dekh rahe hai.
Customer: Ki abhi 10 din ka dekhiye porting ka ek bhi porting ka nahi hai. Battery ka dekhiye battery ka to mahina do mahine se nahi hai. Gelcoat dekhiye khali ek do aaya hoga is mahine mein.
Customer: Hmm sahi. Art resin ka to kya hai wo log aadha kilo ek kilo mangte hai wo to thik hai wo to kuch kuch achhe lage to le lete hai.
Customer: Hmm. Aur baki ka ye to doming ka to nahi hai ye to ek do ek do aata hi hai ek do do teen din mein wo thik hai mai is samajh ke le jata hu. Ya main customer kaisa hai wo dekh ke buylead lena padta hai.
Customer: Customer sahi hai wo to agar fake nikla to kuch bhi nahi wo buylead waste jata hai isliye wo kabhi kabhi aap kehte honge ki ye buylead hum consume nahi karte lekin hume pata rehta hai ye customer fake lag raha hai isliye hum buylead uthate hi nahi wo waste jaane ki wajah se. Aisa rehta hai aur koi koi location ki wajah se bhi hum pehchante hai mai pehchanta hu ki ye buylead fake hai aur nahi wo nahi lene wala hai. Aisa rehta hai. Abhi mai IndiaMART ka mai samajh chuka hu pura.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ki kaun sa buylead fake aane wala hai aur kaun sa mai sab uska data dekhta hu. Mobile pe dekhta hu mobile ke bahar bhi dekhta hu.
Customer: Jaise ki Facebook Instagram mai confirm kar leta hu ki ye customer kaha pe hai. Sahi hai ya galat hai aur jo buylead aata hai samjho ki porting ka aata hai.
Executive: Ji ji right.
Customer: To porting ka buylead aaya to wo uska jo data dikhta hai IndiaMART mein wo usi field mein kaam karta hai ya kabhi kabhi wo dikhata hai ki wo jewellery saman bech raha hai. Kuch kabhi kuch kabhi sell kar raha hai kuch kabhi market se.
Executive: Aap aisa kijiye abhi jo aapne aapne jo mujhe bheja hua hai na epoxy doming epoxy porting compound plastic compound PU casting epoxy porting aur epoxy gelcoat karke hai gelcoat polyurethic PU casting haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan gelcoat hai aapne naam likha to isme jo isme abhi jo hum dekhna jo last isme matlab kam se kam jo hai na 30 se 40 buylead jo transaction humne dekha na usme epoxy gelcoat ka bhi consume aapne kiya hua hai casting ka bhi kiya hua hai.
Customer: Haan haan jo bhi inquiry generate hua hai wo aapne kara hai putty ka inquiry abhi nahi aaya ek hi aaj aapne sirf putty ka kara hai jo putty ka sahi nahi aaya ye kya hai wo liya hai. Haan aaj ek aapne kiya haan nahi wahi bola sir aaj aapne kiya compound porting compound aur battery compound ka inquiry jo hai na waise waise battery compound ka dekhte to hardner ka ek.
Executive: Aawaz gaya. Porting compound ka.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan haan boliye boliye.
Customer: Porting porting compound ka inquiry abhi ek bhi consume nahi hua last 30 40 lead jo mein dekha gaya na usme porting compound ka nahi hua baki cheeze ka inquiry aa rahi hai. Haan aap bolenge jaise swatha inquiry less aa rahi hai. Samajh gaya bas thoda sa active rehna padega kyuki high demand par category products hai ye.
Customer: Mai to 24 hour mein IndiaMART mein rehta hu sir ji.
Executive: Ji. Iska matlab ye nahi sir inquiry nahi aa rahi hai maine aap se aap se jo meri baat hui thi na ek saptaah pehle baat hui thi aap se meri to same cheez aapne bataya tha same cheez maine update kara tha usme. Samjhe Diwali ke pehle category PU casting mein aap se baat ho gayi thi ki PU casting ka achhi tarah se aa raha hai abhi PU casting ka aap hi dekhiye khali ek do aa raha hai aur baki ka to mera usse bhi 10 mein se do teen fake jata hai wo to aap aapke aapke hisab se wo glitch glitch jo hai usme jata hai.
Customer: Ji ji 12 November ko jo hai na.
Customer: Koi koi customer kya rehta hai wo ek to inquiry aisa tha ki wo dance karne wali koi to bhi ek art kala wali ek aurat hai usko kuch to bhi liquid rubber ka material chahiye tha abhi wo dance karne wali usko kyu chahiye liquid rubber ka material. To usko call kiya to wo hai na inquiry aapke paas aayega.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Jo bhi inquiry hai na inquiry aayega ek bhi ek bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi hai jo compound porting compound ka hai na uska keyword category hum update kar dete hai. Thik hai baki baki aap dekhenge sara cheeze aap dekhenge ek aapne polystrene resin aur domain dome resin ka jo aapne bataya tha na to dome resin aapka new product hai right abhi abhi just launch kiya.
Executive: Right.
Customer: Wo to uska aur bhi kuch chalega hafte mein ek baar aaya to bhi chalega wo naya hai isliye wo marketing mein time lagega. Haan to porting porting compound ka aur baki cheeze ka inquiry hai na uska ek baar hum dekh lete hai thik hai wo category update kara dete hai aapne bheja hua hai wo update kar dete hai baki sab inquiry aayega.
Executive: Aap chahe to wo porting compound epoxy ka aur PU casting ka khali dono mein concentrate concentrate kiya to bhi chalega.
Executive: Thik hai baki baki cheeze.
Executive: Ji ji bataiye bataiye. Jo buylead aate hai na 22 wo 22 wagera usme se 15 10 15 to bhi achhe nikle na to bhi bahut hai.
Customer: Baki ka 10 mai bhi samajhta hu.
Executive: Lekin ye aisa ho raha hai na.
Customer: Haan haan to every every month mein hai na every month mein jo hai na hum feedback ko lekar ke na teen chaar baar hum call karte hi karte hai aapko. Samajh gaya call karte hai barabar lekin ye apna product ka sale nahi hona aap dekhiye jitna buylead liye hai. Sir aisa nahi hai dekhiye sir thoda sa na thoda sa dekh thoda sa kam machana hi padega kyuki aise jaruri nahi ki daily basis pe humko 10 12 10 buylead aayega kisi din do bhi aa sakta hai kisi din chaar bhi aa sakta hai kisi din zero bhi ho sakta hai kisi category ka. Lekin ek baat sahi hai ki ye Diwali ke pehle achha chalta tha abhi nahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Demand tha na sir market swatha market mein demand Diwali mein log jyada requirement put kar rahe the na demand tha na us time pe season bhi tha uska Diwali ke pehle. Haan Diwali se pehle to Diwali wala sara Deepawali sar puja ek season ho jata hai na wo to usme log demand bhi karte hai isliye iska kyuki iska market mein requirement hota hai.
Customer: Barabar hai wo.
Executive: Hai na thik hai abhi aap kar lijiye ye porting ka aur PU casting ka jo hai na usme se market bahut chal raha hai wo to hi rehta hai uska dekh lijiye baki saman dekh lijiye.
Customer: Sara polystrene resin.
Executive: Haan polyurethane casting ka dekhiye aur epoxy porting usme jara ji ji ji margin rehta hai. Dusra jo hai na dusra jo hai na jo calls inquiry aapke paas aata hai na calls inquiry.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wo to mujhe.
Customer: Sir miss ho jate hai calls.
Customer: Haan calls aapke paas nahi pahuch rahe kya? 707 mera number dal diya hai aap dekhiye mujhe to number aapka system mein dala hua hai 740910 jo last mein number hai na 740 hum number bata rahe the ek baar number dekhte hai 910 aur 740 ispe jyada call response hota hai isliye aapke aap tak call jata nahi aata hai.
Customer: Aapke paas teenon number pe same time pe ring hoga jo log receive kar lenge pehle na baki par call disconnect ho jayega sir. Haan barabar hai call jo hai na call response thik thak hai aapka koi dikkat nahi hai but thoda sa jo hai na thoda 30 30 35% jo 25% 20 25% jo call miss hota hai na at least koshish kijiye ki wo bhi call response kare aap. Thik hai achha baki baki jo hai na thoda sa rating baki jo hai baki jo hai baki jo hai rating review jo hai na haan rating review mein thoda sa dekhiye kyuki ek do baar jo hai na thoda sa rating aapka down kam diya hua hai jaise Gopal Wade karke ek hai Nirmal Kumar karke hai Bengaluru se wo fake rehte hai wo customer wo khali rate nikalte hai aur query dal lete hai rating ek do rating dal dete hai aisa rehta hai wo fake rehte hai wo market ka competitor rehta hai hamara wo aap wo rating ka hai na wo nikal dijiye ya aap hide kar lijiye usko ye competitor apna market down karne ke liye wo inquiry karte rate dalte hai nikal lete hai aur rating dete hai ek do rating dete hai iski wajah se wo aapko 30 35% dikha raha hai wo aisa hai.
Executive: Okay haan wo wo sab rehta hai to ek baar jo log rating kam deta hai na ek baar unse connect bhi kijiye baat kijiye ki bhai aapne kis kya kis base pe aapne diya hai to usko discuss kar sakte ho uske sath baki rating wagera thik thak hai koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Wo kaise samjhega? Baki sab koi rating kam diya hai wo mujhe kaise samjhega?
Executive: Aapke paas show hota hai na sir?
Customer: Nahi wo rating diya hua unhone ek do wo mujhe wo kaha pe dekhna hoga mujhe dekhiye mai aapke aapke catalog aapke profile pe bhi rating review ka option aata hai my performance pe system ya mobile application pe hai system pe aap login hai ye.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Thik hai profile rating mein aata hai na mai dekh lunga wo. Haan wo aap dekh lijiyega baki abhi thik hai jo aapne feedback diya hai na haan isko close kar sakte hai na abhi?
Customer: Haan thik hai karo abhi aapko sir feedback mere liye feedback hota hai sir wo feedback de dijiyega please aap last time mein diye the feedback karke agar mere yes karke submit kar dijiyega sir mere haath mein hota to mai aapko 10 star de deta. Sir maine aapko pehle bataya hai ki aapko kabhi bhi aapne Saturday bhi message kiya mai reply kiya sir Saturday Sunday off rehta hai maine phir bhi reply kiya ki sir aapko mai isko update kara ke mai aapko Monday connect karunga wo mere call karne se pehle hi aapne udhar feedback submit kar diya sir. Mujhe laga aap chutti pe hai kya? Are nahi sir nahi hai maine bola hai mere mere dimag mein tha bas wo category lead pehle lead to dekh lete na lead kya hai nahi hai aapko directly call nahi kar sakte na maine dekh ke na mere aakhe dekhne lagi lekin buylead nahi aa raha hai aisa ho raha hai chashme ka number badh raha hai. Koi nahi sir aapko aapko jab bhi problem ho call message aap hame karte hai na aap hame dijiye.
Customer: Haan. Ek kaam kijiye aap mujhe chashma ka number bada hai na uska kuch to mai chashma karke leta hu. Abhi kabhi kabhi kabhi chutti aisa milega aayenge to jarur milenge aapko rasta mein hum. Chalega chashma leke aaiye. Thik hai sir abhi thik hai bada hua haan thik hai thik hai hum close kar rahe hai abhi register mail id pe jayega feedback na please yes karke kuch comment mein dal ke submit kar dijiyega sir jo bhi aapko lagega. Sanjay sir unko baat karke ek mahine hold kijiye.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Raman bhai good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon sir good afternoon kaise hai? Bas chal raha hai lekin thoda problem mehsoos ho raha hai to sir ko bola hai se baat kiya abhi to thoda dijiye thoda kya hota hai ki bahut lamba amount diya hua hai aur call ka charge main sir se bhi meri baat chit hui thi aur aapko bhi main piche call kar raha tha aap dekhenge aapke paas bhi call ja raha tha mera to baat nahi hui thi aap se.
Executive: Nahi actually kya ho jata aapka jab call aata hai na to mai to gadi chala raha tha ya to purve chala raha tha ya to pule chala raha tha. Hmm. Wahi chakkar rehta hai. Chalo thik hai mai sir ko bola hai on behalf of us aap baat karte rahe aur hum sir se baat karte rehte hai ki kya problem hai kya nahi kya nahi. Haan koi nahi koi nahi sir aa raha hai thoda dhyan dijiye kyuki call lead ka charges bahut jyada ja raha hai humko. Sir jo call karta hai na call karta hai to usko to nahi kar sakte kuch hum but buylead ka jo hai na buylead ka porting ka khali nahi aa rahi hai PU ka wo bhi hum dekh lete hai wo bhi aana chalu ho jayega wahi. Thik hai bas sir yahi sir close karne ka thik hai close karenge na aapke mail pe register mail id pe feedback jayega please submit kar dijiyega wo mere liye hota hai sir. Mail karunga thik hai haan sir jayega submit ho jayega call okay sir okay sir haan okay okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants more buyleads for porting compound.

- Inquiries are fake and waste of money.

- Rating is low.

- Calls are missed.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the keyword category.

- Executive assured to check PU buyleads.

- Executive asked to connect with low rating customers.

- Executive explained call receiving process.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will submit feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, rating, feedback, category
